channel.title: Making items unspawnable for players and donors. [PI]

item.title: Making items unspawnable for players and donors. [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Nathan6 Nathan_
item.description:
@Nathan6 wrote:

[quote=“Thanks, post:2, topic:422174”][code]
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“item”) && c.playerRights >= 2) {
try {
String[] args = playerCommand.split(" “);
if (args.length == 3) {
int[] NO_SPAWN = {1038};
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
for (int i = 0; i < NO_SPAWN.length; i++) {
if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)
&& newItemID != NO_SPAWN[i]) {
c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“That item cannot be spawned or does not exist.”);
}
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(”");
}
} catch (Exception e) {

                    }
            }[/code][/quote]

I don’t think you’ve understood. I want a spawn server, but not all items spawnable. The items I have made unspawnable the owners/admins can’t spawn either, I want to know how it will only let the admins and owners spawn them items that guests/donors can’t spawn.

Read full topic

item.title: Making items unspawnable for players and donors. [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Nathan6 Nathan_
item.description:
@Nathan6 wrote:

Right, basically I have added a item command to my commands.java and it doesn’t allow any playerRight to spawn. Not even owners, can somebody tell me how to make the items that aren’t spawnable for all the playerRights, spawnable for admins and owners.
Here is my item command:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("item")) {
			try {
				String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
				if (args.length == 3) {
					int[] NO_SPAWN = {1038};
					int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
					int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
					for (int i = 0; i < NO_SPAWN.length; i++) {
						if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)
								&& newItemID != NO_SPAWN[i]) {
							c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
						} else {
							c.sendMessage("That item cannot be spawned or does not exist.");
						}
					}
				} else {
					c.sendMessage("");
				}
			} catch (Exception e) {

			}
		}

Thanks.

Read full topic
